name: Visual FoxPro Label Memo
summary: An LBT file is a memo for a label definition ( .LBX file) created by the now-discontinued Microsoft Visual FoxPro database management system. It stores text-based notes that Visual FoxPro developers add when working with LBX label files so future users can reference them to understand their functionality better. LBT files bear the same name as the LBX label files with which they are associated ( example.lbx and example.lbt ).

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
